snippet: India’s new prime minister has succeeded in associating his personal style with his political platform, especially with the Modi Kurta.
abstract: India’s new prime minister has succeeded in associating his personal style with his political platform, especially with the Modi Kurta.

headline.main: Narendra Modi, the Prime Minister of India: A Leader Who Is What He Wears
headline.print_headline: A Leader Who Is What He Wears
